All Changelog Tags

These are Tags to help you differentiate between Bugs & Changes, Additions & Reworks, Removals & Reverts.

+ None, read All Site Tags for Tag info.

- : Features recently deleted from the Mod/Site.
= : CHANGES, but specifically to make a Feature run/look better.
= : Features that have been altered in some way.
= : Typos that have been corrected.
+ : Features recently ADDED to the Mod/Site.
+ : Mixture of NEW & CHANGE, (mostly used for Role Reworks).
+ : Mixture of NEW, CHANGE, & TYPO, (mostly used for Role Renames).
+ : Not NEW, but was REMOVED previously, and added back. (mostly used when Roles Re-added).
- : Mixture of REMOVED & CHANGE, (mostly used for Role Reverts).
= : Bugs/Buggy Features that have been fixed.
= : Recently added/finished Translations for the mod, the Tag on the change itself will be custom.
= : Not necessarily a big change/addition/etc, but important to keep in mind.
= : Small Info/Announcement. (Typically relating to website)
= : Bugs that are currently being worked on, or are not currently resolvable.

Credit to: TOHE Website & The Enhanced Network (TEN)
